TABLE.NAME: coursesearch
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the coursesearch activity module instances

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field

FIELD.NAME: searchscope
FIELD.COMMENT: The scope of search (course, activities, resources, forums, all)

FIELD.NAME: placeholder
FIELD.COMMENT: Placeholder text for the search input

FIELD.NAME: embedded
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the search bar should be embedded in the course page

FIELD.NAME: grouped
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether search results should be grouped by section

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified
